stanza.line: How careful was I when I took myway
Each trifle under truest bars tothrust
That to my use it might unusedstay
From hands of falsehood in sure wards oftrust
But thou to whom my jewels trifles are
Most worthy comfort now my greatestgrief
Thou best of dearest and mine only care
Art left the prey of every vulgarthief
Thee have I not locked up in anychest
Save where thou art not though I feel thouart
Within the gentle closure of mybreast
From whence at pleasure thou mayst come andpart
And even thence thou wilt be stoln Ifear
For truth proves thievish for a prize sodear
